hero.description: Discover the world’s best coffee, delivered to your door. Freshly roasted, ethically sourced, and always delicious.

subscribeForm.heading: Be The First To Know
subscribeForm.description: Get notified about new product releases and exclusive promotions.

productTabs.fastDeliveryDesc: Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days at your pick up location or in the comfort of your home.
productTabs.simpleExchangesDesc: Is the fit not quite right? No worries - we'll exchange your product for a new one.
productTabs.easyReturnsDesc: Just return your product and we'll refund your money. No questions asked – we'll do our best to make sure your return is hassle-free.

emptyCart.heading: Cart
emptyCart.message: You don't have anything in your cart. Let's change that, use the link below to start browsing our products.

review.heading: Review
review.terms: By clicking the Place Order button, you confirm that you have read, understand and accept our Terms of Use, Terms of Sale and Returns Policy and acknowledge that you have read One Million Store's Privacy Policy.

relatedProducts.message: You might also want to check out these products.

account.faqPrompt: You can find frequently asked questions and answers on our customer service page.
account.profileDescription: View and update your profile information, including your name, email, and phone number. You can also update your billing address, or change your password.
account.addressesDescription: View and update your shipping addresses, you can add as many as you like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.
account.ordersDescription: View your previous orders and their status. You can also create returns or exchanges for your orders if needed.

accountInfo.errorMessage: An error occurred, please try again

orders.noOrdersYet: You don't have any orders yet, let us change that :)
